1153440.name: RPG Maker MV - TOKIWA GRAPHICS Classic Monsters Pack S No.2
1153440.description:
The second subspecies volume Classic Monsters Pack No.2 is here with brand new looks!

Have fun and confuse your players with new, additional versions of the evolved monsters right after he fought against the first one! Slime Jelly may be a good item dropper when defeated and Mandragora evolved into Mandrake with beautiful flowers. This pack will expand the variation and possibilities of these interesting and cute creatures.

FEATURES:

* 4 monster battlers: Slime Jelly, Mandrake, Lizard Warrior, Imp in 4 color variations; day / sunset / night / rain. Total of 16 battler graphics.
* Each character comes with walking sprites in 2 variations (normal and dark shadow). Total of 8 sprites.
* This pack is for RPG Maker use only!
1153440.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
